TEXT.TITLE: BARRINGER RESOURCES INC <BARR> YEAR END DEC 31
TEXT.BODY: Shr profit 70 cts vs loss 33 cts Net profit 2,598,000 vs loss 687,000 Revs 7,438,000 vs 6,467,000 NOTE: 1986 net includes 2,168,000 dlrs or 61 cts a share for gain on cancellation of long-term debt through a debenture offer. Reuter
